TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content:
Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Examples :

Lash Gordon - A prequel to Mutiny on the Bounty

Beakdance - A story of inner city budgies channeling their hopes into street dance
planet of the PE`s: a astronaut gets stuck in a world filled with overweight, fat, annoying and very angry PE teachers named chuck (no offense to any PE teacher called chuck.)

Tar Trek: The Motion Picture. About a group of people walking around in some tar pits.

Edited April 1, 2016 by Norpo
/s/,/./g
He Martian; it's a guy who pretends to be a Martian.
Ad Max:  the story of a cubicle denizen working a thankless job at an advertising agency
Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factor: A thrilling documentary that details the effects of chocolate and how it has influenced civilization.

3 hours ago, Norpo said:

Tar Trek: The Motion Picture. About a group of people walking around in some tar pits.

And of course Tar Wars about some people fighting over the same tar pits.

EDIT

The World according to ARP, a film about the global influence of networking protocols

also

Pup fiction, a film about a young dog that write books

Edited April 1, 2016 by John FX
Jurrasic word; its dinosaurs playing word games
Super Size E: Morgan Spurlock follows the effect of the letter "E" on his body.
The leg movie; a movie about legs.
Lord of He-Rings. The hotly-anticipated live actions crossover between He-Man and the Green Lantern.

Hoe; a movie about all kinds of hoes.

Wall; a movie about a trash bot who pretends to be a wall.

Star rek; a ton of of space ships get rekt for April fools!
The little hose on the prairie, a small garden hose has life affirming realisations about itself while becoming a cattle herder

Forbidden Plane, a tale of people held captive at an airport by TSA workers

Mobile Sit Gundam, a demolition derby consisting of folks crashing into each other while sitting in wheeled office chairs

Lien, the Xenomorph loanshark. Pay up your mortgage or else!

Light of the Navigator, a 3.25 hour view of a lighthouse on a stormy night.

Word War Z, the last in a 26-part docu-drama detailing competitive crossword puzzle solving.

Edited April 1, 2016 by Xorth Tanovar

Superma v. Batman: Dawn of Justice

An elderly mother goes face to face with the epitome of darkness in an epic showdown of kitchen utensils and Bat-prefixes.

Gravit; a documentary on gravioli and someone spelled it wrong.

Edited April 1, 2016 by max_creative

Dadpool: A documentary about a dad whose singular goal is to own a pool

Edited April 1, 2016 by Dark Junior

Daddy's hoe; a dad who likes to hoe.

Mon; a movie about why it is not spelled "mun" not mon.

Ion Man: The thrilling life story of the inventor of the IX-6315 "Dawn" Electric Propulsion System.

Lie of Pi: conspiracy documentary about how the number pi doesn't exist and was created by the illuminati, bla bla bla mind control waves bla bla tin foil hats bla aliens.

Harry Otter: about an otter named Harry.

X-en: comedy about the aliens from Half-Life and their home world.

Apolio 13: documentary about a polio outbreak in the 13th century.

Jurrasic ark; about dinosaurs who are building a big boat.

star war; a bunch of stars get in a fight. 

nside out; the north side of something gets seen from outside.
The Geat Escape: Steve McQueen portrays an ancient northern-European warrior.
The Hobbi: The untold story of the invention of Subbuteo.

The entire jurrasic series:

jurrasic ark. The Dinosaurs build a big boat.

jurrasic ark the lost world. The dinosaurs get stuck somewhere.

jurrasic ark III. The dinosaurs actually get something done. 

Jurassic Word. They find an island and get board so they play word games.
Hatman: a movie I would totally watch about the xkcd hat guy.

Apollo 1: The story of how three astronauts died in a fire in the Command Module, and the moments afterwards.

Graviy: A documentary on the significance of gravy and correct spelling.
